org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.attachment
Class AeStoredAttachmentItem

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.attachment.AeStoredAttachmentItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeAttachmentItem
public class AeStoredAttachmentItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeAttachmentItem

Represents an attachment item that has been stored by the attachment manager.

          Attachment's id.
